title: Freezer Prep Breakfast Sandwiches
directions: 2.Spray a 9x13-inch baking dish with cooking spray.
3.In the dish, beat the eggs, milk, salt, and pepper. Bake until the top starts to get golden brown, about 25 minutes.
4.Place your meats on a 9x13 sheet pan, either nonstick or lined with foil.
5.Bake 10-15 minutes, flipping halfway, or until the bacon is crispy.
6.Arrange your sliced English muffins on another sheet pan and brush with melted butter.
8.Cut your parchment paper into 8x8-inch squares for each breakfast sandwich.
9.Lay your moistened paper towel across the parchment and assemble your breakfast sandwiches.
10.Wrap the assembled sandwich in the moist paper towel first, to ensure freezer freshness and even cooking when microwaved. Then wrap in parchment and label.
11.Store in an airtight plastic bag up to one month in the freezer.
12.When ready to eat, microwave on high for 3 minutes, then let sit for one to two minutes until no longer steamy.
ingredients: 3 slices of bacon, each cut in half
